data.message: Never was a fan of rap, til M awed me, showed me I'm crap. LL had my sista's heart when we were kids raised racist, WHAT! Dre's the bomb, feel it, WOW! thanks to rap I see it now. Thanks, Marshall, you changed me, POW!, by being the man and showing me how.
